patthana3.2:1.1: Sahetukaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:2.1: Sahetukaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:3.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte ekaṁ, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye ekaṁ, purejāte ekaṁ, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme ekaṁ, āhāre ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:4.1: Sahetukaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:5.1: Naadhipatiyā ekaṁ, napurejāte ekaṁ, napacchājāte ekaṁ, naāsevane ekaṁ, nakamme ekaṁ, navipāke ekaṁ, navippayutte ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:8.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:9.1: Sahetuko kusalo dhammo sahetukassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:10.1: Sahetuko kusalo dhammo sahetukassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

(Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:12.1: Sahetuko kusalo dhammo sahetukassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:16.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.2:17.1: Sahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:18.1: Ahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:19.1: Sahetukaṁ akusalañca ahetukaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:20.1: Sahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Sahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Sahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo ca ahetuko akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana3.2:21.1: Ahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana3.2:22.1: Sahetukaṁ akusalañca ahetukaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana3.2:23.1: Sahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:24.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye pañca, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:25.1: Sahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:26.1: Sahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:27.1: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, navippayutte pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana3.2:31.1: Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana3.2:32.1: Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.2:33.1: Ahetuko akusalo dhammo ahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.2:34.1: Sahetuko akusalo ca ahetuko akusalo ca dhammā sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.2:35.1: Sahetuko akusalo dhammo sahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:36.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana3.2:130.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:131.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:135.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.2:136.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:137.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… kamme nava, āhāre nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:138.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā … nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:139.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:142.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:143.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:144.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:145.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:146.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava …pe… noavigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:149.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.2:150.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:151.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:152.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:153.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:156.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:157.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:158.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:159.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:163.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.2:165.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:166.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:167.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:168.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:171.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:172.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:173.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava …pe… āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:174.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:178.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.2:179.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:180.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:181.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:182.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:185.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:186.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:187.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:188.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:192.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.2:193.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:194.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:195.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:196.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:199.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:200.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:201.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:202.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:206.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.2:208.1: Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:209.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ (sabbattha ekaṁ), avigate ekaṁ.
patthana3.2:210.1: Naadhipatiyā ekaṁ, napurejāte ekaṁ …pe… navipāke ekaṁ, navippayutte ekaṁ. (Pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana3.2:211.1: Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:212.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ (sabbattha ekaṁ), avigate ekaṁ. (Hetupaccayo natthi. Pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ, pañhāvārepi imesaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ hetupaccayo natthi.)
patthana3.2:213.1: Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko abyākato ca nahetu ahetuko abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:214.1: Nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.2:215.1: Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ abyākatañca nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:216.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:217.1: Nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:218.1: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:221.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:222.1: Nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:223.1: Ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:224.1: Nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.2:228.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
